sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../privacy-policy/PrivacyPolicy.css"; const Disclaimer = () => { return (

Disclaimer

last updated: June 12, 2023

The following disclaimer is provided for the Mentor A Promise, Inc. website ("the Website") and applies to all users accessing or utilizing the Website's services:

general information

The content on the Website is intended for general informational purposes only. It does not constitute legal, financial, or medical advice. Visitors should not rely solely on the information provided on the Website and should consult relevant professionals for specific advice.

minors and guardians

The Website collects information from minors and their guardians for the purpose of connecting them with educational resources and tutors. We take privacy and data protection seriously. However, the Website cannot guarantee the security of information transmitted over the internet. Users are advised to exercise caution when providing personal information.

third party resources and tutors

The Website may provide links or information regarding third-party educational resources and tutors. While efforts are made to ensure the quality and reliability of these resources and tutors, the Website cannot guarantee their accuracy, effectiveness, or suitability. Users are encouraged to conduct their own research and exercise their judgment before engaging with any third-party resources or tutors.

background checks

The Website conducts background checks on tutors affiliated with the platform. However, the Website cannot guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the background checks. Users should exercise their own discretion and perform additional due diligence before engaging in tutoring sessions.

external links

The Website may contain external links to other websites. These links are provided for convenience and informational purposes only. The inclusion of external links does not imply endorsement or control over the content or practices of those websites. Users should review the terms and policies of the linked sites before accessing or relying on their content.

limitation of liability

The Website and its administrators, volunteers, affiliates, or partners shall not be held liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use or inability to use the Website or its services, including but not limited to, loss of data, loss of revenue, or personal injury.

modification and updates

The Website reserves the right to modify, update, or remove any content, features, or services provided on the Website without prior notice.

By accessing or using the Website and its services, users acknowledge and agree to the terms of this disclaimer. Users are encouraged to review the disclaimer periodically for any updates or changes. If any provision of this disclaimer is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact us directly.

); }; export default Disclaimer;
